Mercedes ofrece un servicio muy completo, ella le propone al cliente comprar las telas y accesorios para coordinar que las prendas terminadas sean lo más estéticas posibles y se cumpla con el objetivo, es por ello que en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará telas, hilos, encajes, botones, cremalleras y accesorios. Esta inversión agiliza la producción y con ello beneficia los tiempos de entrega, lo que dinamiza el flujo de caja.  Su meta familiar es tener su casa propia, por ello ella desea continuar muy comprometida y motivada en su taller de confecciones.
texts.en:
From a very young age, Mercedes showed a liking for designing and making clothes. She learned this art from her mother, a seamstress who was her tutor. Now, Mercedes’ dressmaking business is an important source of income for her. She has been working in this field for 20 years. 

Mercedes has managed to support herself thanks to her excellent services and avant-garde designs. These characteristics have helped Mercedes to bring together a loyal customer base.

Mercedes produces uniforms for businesses and schools, plus dresses, blouses, shirts and other clothing items. She offers a full service. Mercedes buys her own material and accessories so that the finished item is as attractive as possible.  

To do this, Mercedes is applying for a Kiva loan, her first through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use this loan to buy material, threads, lace, buttons, zips and accessories.

These purchases will make production more agile, reduce the speed of production and improve cash flow. 

Mercedes’ goal is to own her own house. She therefore continues to be dedicated and motivated at her dressmaking workshop.

loans.use: to buy material, threads, lace, buttons, zips and accessories.

loans.name: Ayşe

texts.en:
Ayşe is a 19-year-old entrepreneur. She trains half the day at a hairdressers. The rest of her time she spends providing hairdressing services to her friends and neighbors. 

With her loan from Maya, Ayşe will buy wax and hair dye wholesale. When she earns her certification, she wants to open her own salon.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Ayşe hanım 19 yaşında genç bir girişimci.  Kendisi bir kuaförde yarım gün kalfalık eğitimi alıyor.  Geri kalan zamanlarda evinden komşularına ve çevresine kuaförlük hizmeti veriyor.  Ayşe Hanım Mayadan aldığı kredi ile toptan ağda ve saç boyası aldı.  Ustalık belgesini aldıktan sonra bir kuaför dükkânı açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy wax and hair dye wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock for more income gain.

loans.name: Imeda

texts.en:
Imeda, who is a 23-year-old young man, lives in the village of Peria. He has a pensioner father and a mother who is a housekeeper. For more than 11 years, the family members have been involved in an agricultural activity and earned some income from selling products at the local market. Imeda developed fruit and citrus growing and works hard to provide financial stability for his parents. However, as he gets only seasonal income and finds it hard to tackle the financial difficulties, Imeda decided to become involved in another activity and do his best for his family's welfare. 

The startup program, a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables the rural poor to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. His application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of $2,500 for purchasing a secondhand car and start providing taxi service. He will serve local people and will generate a daily income, which will help him satisfy the increased needs of his family.
 
Imeda relies on the goodwill of Kiva lenders and will be very thankful for the chance to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a car and start providing taxi service

loans.name: Oscar David

texts.es:
Estudiar y trabajar a la vez no es una tarea fácil, pero sin duda vale la pena para mejorar a futuro, nuestras condiciones de vida, asegura Oscar, un joven universitario de último de contabilidad pública y auditoria, que para apoyarse en su educación superior  trabaja de día y de noche estudia.

Sin embargo, solicita un crédito para pagar un curso de  titulación que le ayudará a finalizar su carrera universitaria. Además, espera graduarse lo más pronto posible para iniciar su vida laboral en un área de su carrera, y así ahorrar para comprar su casa.
texts.en:
It is not easy to both study and work, but is worth the effort to improve the quality of life in the future, says Oscar, a young university student. He is at his last year of Public Accounting and Audit and works during the day and studies at night. 

He is requesting a loan to cover tuition expenses of a seminar that will help him finish his degree. He expects to graduate as soon as possible so that he can start a career and save to buy a house.

loans.use: to cover tuition expenses of a seminar.

loans.name: Caminando Con Jesus Group

texts.es: Alexander es un joven emprendedor de 25 años de edad,trabaja en la imprenta que formo su familia hace 15 años, al mismo tiempo estudia Negocios Internacionales,y sueña poder terminar rápido sus estudios para poder dedicarse netamente a la imprenta como publicista al lado de su hermano,Alexander pertenece al grupo Caminando con Jesús,un grupo solidario y comunicativo, Alexander agradece el préstamo recibido ya que lo ayudara a la compra de mercadería para su negocio  y sus estudios, se siente contento y agradecido de saber que gente como Kiva  ayudan a miles de personas sin conocerlos. Alexander dice: "Gracias kiva por la ayuda prestada les prometo que no los voy a defraudar"
texts.en:
Alexander is a 25-year old young entrepreneur who works in the printing house that his family started 15 years ago. He also studies International Business at university and dreams to finish soon to work full time at the printing house as a publicist next to his brother. Alexander is a member of the group Caminando with Jesus, a caring and communicative group. 

Alexander is grateful for the loan received as it will help him to buy stock for his business and to cover tuition expenses. He is happy and grateful to know that people at Kiva help thousands of people without knowing them. Alexander says: "Thanks Kiva for your support; I promise I will not let you down".

loans.use: to invest in his business buying stock.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with seven children.

She runs a dried fish business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Gina dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Shaqe

texts.en:
Shaqe lives in Vanadzor town with her husband and four children. Her elder daughter is a student in university. Two children attend school, and the eldest son, Lyudvik, helps his parents to earn income for the family. 

Shaqe asks for this loan to be able to cover her daughter Qristine's university tuition. It is very important for Shaqe to pay for her daughter's education and give her an opportunity to get a higher education degree.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: Pachacutec De Yanatile Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PACHACUTEQ DE YANATILE,el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Yanatile,provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Nilda tiene 49 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, a la vez la socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the communal bank Pachacuteq de Yanatile, located in the district of Yanatile, province of Calca, department of Cusco. Nilda is 49 years old, single and mother of 2 children. She combines two different activities: she has worked in agriculture for some time and the business goes well thanks to her dedication; and she also breeds small animals. She wants to keep working like this to support her family. 

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. The group members are grateful for the loan received and commit to repay as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Starlyn Ernesto

texts.es:
Starlyn Ernesto es un joven estudiante de Publicidad, él solicita un prestamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Starlyn, tengo 18 años de edad. Vivo en Santo Domingo. Desde siempre he vivido como mis padres y mis dos hermanos. 
Soy estudiante de Publicidad, la mejor oferta académica de esta carrera se encuentra en la Universidad APEC, por tanto empecé a estudiar en esta. Voy por mi segundo cuatrimestre y me encanta todo lo que engloba. Hasta ahora mis materias favoritas son: Dibujo, Fotografía y Matemáticas.  
Necesito el préstamo porque mi situación económica no me permite pagar la universidad con el ritmo adecuado y no quisiera dejar de estudiar. Siento que mis padres van muy forzados y si recibo este préstamo sería un alivio para todos, cambiaria totalmente la situación  y tomaría seriamente el compromiso que conlleva el préstamo. En caso de no conseguir este préstamo, sería muy difícil continuar.
Quiero graduarme con honores, tener una familia a la cual no le falte nada y promover proyectos para ayudar a las demás personas que tienen ganas de estudiar y que solo les hace falta un empujón al igual que yo.
texts.en:
Starlyn Ernesto is a young student of Advertising. He is requesting a loan to cover tuition expenses. 

This is his story: My name is Starlyn and I am 18 years old. I live in Santa Domingo with my parents and two brothers. I study Advertising in APEC University, where the best programs in the field are offered. I am in my second four-month period and really enjoy what it covers. My favorite classes are Drawing, Photography and Math. I need the loan because my financial situation does not allow me to cover tuition at the appropriate pace and I do not wish to withdraw. My parents are tight on money and this loan would be a relief for everyone. It would radically change the situation and I would take on the commitment involved with responsibility. It would be very difficult to continue without this loan. I would like to graduate with honors, to have a family with its needs covered, and to promote projects to help other people that want to study but do not have the means.

loans.use: to cover university tuition expenses.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se encuentra cerca al valle del río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Ferreñafe, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero desde hace 07 años, comercializando la leche fresca en su domicilio, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado lechero para incrementar su negocio, esto le permitirá mejorar su nivel de ventas lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 44-year old man who lives with his wife and children in the district of Zaña, a community located near the valley of the Jequetepeque river. This area is known for its agriculture, trade and stockbreeding, and is located in the province of Ferreñafe, region of Lambayeque, north coast of Peru. 

He makes a living breeding cows, something he has done for 7 years. He sells fresh milk at his house and has experience in the business as well as good personal and professional references in the district. His wife helps him a lot. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more cows to expand the business. This will help to increase sales and income level, and ultimately improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy more cows to expand his business.

loans.name: Anamae

texts.en:
Aname is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Aname is 36 years old and both of her children are sent to school.

Aname has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more items like pants, blouses, school uniforms and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Aname has been in this business for five years. In the future, Aname would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items like pants, blouses, school uniforms and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Razanamanana Harilalao

texts.fr:
Miry Alice est une femme très travailleuse, infatigable ayant un esprit créatif. Infatigable parce que, elle quitte son domicile très tôt le matin et ne rentre que très tard le soir. 
Elle vend différents sortes d'articles et de produits: un peu de fourniture scolaire, un peu de produits cosmétiques, un peu de produits ménagers etc... , presque tous les produits de premières nécessités non périssable. Elle effectue du commerce ambulant. Elle rejoint chaque jour le marché des villages en milieux ruraux aux alentours de la capitale et les péripheries. Elle demande un prêt pour acheter des produits supplémentaires, car c'est en ce moment la période la plus propice pour les ventes à la campagne.
Miry Alice a 38 ans  et a 4 enfants. Sa fille ainée est déjà mariée, et un de ses enfants va à l'école. Elle est mariée et son marie l'appuie dans l'exercice de son activité.
texts.en:
Miry Alice is a very hardworking, tireless woman, with a creative mind. She is tireless because she leaves early in the morning and comes home only late at night.

She sells different kinds of articles and products: some school supplies, some cosmetics, some household products, etc., almost all nonperishable basic necessities. She is an itinerant vendor, and each day goes to markets in rural villages around the capital and its periphery.

She is requesting a loan to purchase additional products, as this is currently the best time for sales in the countryside.

Miry Alice is 38 years old and has four children. Her eldest daughter is already married, and one of her children goes to school. She is married and her husband supports her business activity.

loans.use: buy toothpaste, toilet soap, shampoos, razors, pens, markers, watches, etc.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a firewood sales business in the Philippines and earns additional income from vegetable vending.  Marites is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more firewood to sell to her customers.

Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.name: Buseesa Farmers Group

texts.en: Jesca, who is in the Buseesa Farmers Group where members guarantee each other to get a loan, is married with five children living in Kagadi, Uganda. Her business is buying and selling produce to the local people in her area. She started the business in 2011, supplementing it with farming. She has a dream of having a stable business that can sustain her family financially despite the lack of enough capital to buy enough stock. Jesca needs a loan to buy produce like maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy produce like maize to sell.

loans.name: Serpil

texts.en:
Serpil moved back in with her family after her divorce.  Because her baklava was so well liked, she began taking orders for it.  Now she sells it as a business and takes orders. With her loan from Maya, she’ll buy sugar, flour and walnuts wholesale.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Serpil hanım eşinden ayrıldıktan sonra ailesiyle birlikte yaşamaya başlıyor.  Yaptığı baklavalar çevresi tarafından çok beğenilince sipariş almaya başlamış.  Şuan bir işletmeye düzenli olarak baklava yapıyor.  Bunun dışında gelen siparişleri de değerlendiriyor.  Maya ‘dan aldığı kredi ile toptan olarak şeker, un ve ceviz aldı.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour and walnuts wholesale

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia is 74 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Bonifacia has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing net and other equipment.

Bonifacia has been in this business for 21 years. In the future, Bonifacia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment

loans.name: Nahide

texts.en:
Nahide is married and 48 years old.  She sells manti (Turkish ravioli) and pasta to contribute to the family income.  A friend of hers asked her to make manti for her, and it was well liked, so she began ordering it all the time.  She also makes it to order for some restaurants.  With her loan from Maya, she’ll buy ground beef wholesale to make manti.  She’ll be able to increase her stock so she has some on hand for customers.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Nahide hanım evli ve 48 yaşında.  Mantı ve makarna yaparak ev bütçesine katkı sağlıyor.  Bir arkadaşı kendisine mantı yapması için sipariş veriyor ve yaptığı mantılar beğenilince çevresi sürekli sipariş vermeye başlamış.  Anlaştığı lokantalardan da düzenli olarak sipariş alıyor.  Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile toptan un ve kıyma aldı.  Aldığı toptan malzemeyle mantı yaptı.  Gelen siparişleri bekletmeden elinin altında sürekli bulunan mantılardan verebiliyor.

loans.use: to buy ground beef wholesale to make manti (Turkish ravioli)

loans.name: Nurşen

texts.en:
Nurşen began making and selling stuffed grape leaves on a friend's advice.  At first, she had few orders.  In time, people became familiar with her products and she began making stuffed grape leaves for restaurants, weddings and funerals.  With her loan from Maya, she’ll buy grape leaves and rice wholesale.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Nurşen Hanım arkadaşının teşvikiyle sarma yapıp satmaya başlamış.  Önceleri siparişleri çok azmış. Zamanla tanınmaya başlayınca siparişleri artmış ve lokantalara, düğünlere ve mevlitlere toptan olarak sarma yapmaya başlamış.  Maya ‘dan aldığı kredi ile toptan asma yaprağı ve pirinç alarak siparişlerini arttırdı.

loans.use: to buy grape leaves and rice wholesale

loans.name: Cesiri Group

texts.fr:
Moussa  est le monsieur qui  tient le bout du sac d’arachide dans sa main droite sur la photo.
Moussa  est  un  malien  non scolarisé, âgé de 55 ans, marié et  Père de 07 enfants, âgés de 3 ans à  27 ans dont 3  sont scolarisés. Sa femme est une ménagère.
 Moussa fait  le commerce des céréales (mil, sorgho, riz, mais etc...) Il prend le prêt avec le RMCR pour acheter  beaucoup  de sacs de céréales. Il s’approvisionne  dans  les foires environnantes  et revend dans les mêmes foires.  Il  a une expérience de 10 ans  d’activité.
 Dans ses ventes, il gagne en moyenne 30000 FCFA de profit par mois. Avec le profit,  Moussa  pourra subvenir aux besoins de sa famille (habillement, santé et frais de scolarité).  Il est souvent confronté à la mévente, mais s’est  organisé à avoir un acheteur en gros qui fera  généralement les achats de ses céréales.  
Dans l’avenir  Moussa  veut  un prêt beaucoup plus  élevé pour développer son  activité  de commerce de céréale afin de gagner plus de profit pour  faire un jardin potager pour sa  famille.
texts.en:
Moussa is the gentleman who is holding the tip of the bag of groundnuts in his right hand on the photo. He is an uneducated Malian, 55 years old, and the married father of seven children, from three to 27 years old, three of whom attend school. His wife is a housewife.

Moussa trades grain cereals (millet, sorghum, rice, maize, etc.). He is taking a loan with RMCR to buy many bags of grain. He gets his supplies from fairs in the area and resells in the same venues. He has over ten years' experience in this activity.

His average sales profits amount to 30,000 CFA per month. With these profits, Moussa can provide for his family (clothing, health and school fees).

He is often confronted with poor sales, but has an arrangement with a wholesale buyer who will generally purchase his cereals.

In the future Moussa wants a much larger loan, so he can expand his grain-trading business, increase his earnings, and make a vegetable garden for his family.

loans.use: buy bags of cereal bags for sale after storage

loans.name: Dubai Group

texts.en:
Victoria is a 32 year old woman, not married and has three children, two in school and one still a baby. Currently she runs a food business, (mamalishe) and a retail shop for three years now. She works from 6am to 8pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Victoria's 6th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase the shop inventory and now the shop is really big and attractive to many customers.  She then opened a mamalishe business and it is now doing great.  She used the profit to pay school fees, loan repayments, bought a plot of land and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to buy food cooking ingredients for her mamalishe and to increase on the retail shop investment.  She dreams of building her own house.  

Victoria will share this loan with her loan group Dubai, which consist of two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy food cooking ingredients for her mamalishe and to increase on the retail shop investment.

loans.name: Muong Phang 24 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Huong is a 45-year-old Thai ethnic lady who has been married and has an adult daughter, who currently studies at medical college. She works at agricultural production to provide for the family, with plenty of activities such as cultivating rice, growing cassava, corn, and raising pigs, chickens and ducks. 

Mrs. Huong is a very hard-working farmer. Indeed, she has continued expanding and diversifying production with the financial support and training as well as the counseling of the Anh Chi Em Program. This is the third time, she has taken out a loan from the Program and she will use it to buy young fish and food for the fish. She hopes her investment will go smoothly, so that she could cover better living expenses for her family. 

Mrs. Huong dreams of a more abundant life for her family and a bright future for her daughter. In the picture, she stands at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy young fish and food for the fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow so as to increase the amount of milk supplied for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy phone chargers,batteries and phone covers for sale and hopes he will generate more income to support his family.

loans.name: Karla Grisel

texts.en: Karla Grisel is 32 years old and she has a small shop inside her house where she produces billboards and other advertising materials for her clients. She is asking for a loan to buy some equipment that will permit her to make different type of products for her clients. She says that it still is a small business and she has many recurring clients.

loans.use: To buy equipment to produce billboards.

loans.name: Dania

texts.es:
La señora Dania  de 47  años  de edad,  vive con sus dos hijos  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 20 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería en general como ser: arroz, frijoles, maíz, pastas de tomate, churros, jabón, frescos, verduras, lácteos, embutidos y pollo, además vende tacos, enchiladas, comida, carne asada, pollo, yuca, etc.  Su venta es con los vecinos y amigos que a diario visitan su negocio. Doña Dania es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante ella con su esfuerzo a podido estudiar a todas sus hijas y a construido su casa es un ejemplo en su comunidad.
Doña Dania esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de arroz, frijoles, maíz, pastas de tomate, churros, jabón, frescos, verduras, lácteos, embutidos y pollo ya que necesita invertir más en su negocio para lograr más ganancias ya que viene la semana santa y desea tener surtido y comprar leña seca para cocinar sus golosinas ella desea aprovechar la época la semana santa.
Es su octavo crédito con Prisma y Agradece a Kiva es muy buena paga. su sueño es mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2015.
texts.en:
Dania is 47 years old and lives in her home with her two sons. For the past 20 years, she has been making a living selling groceries such as rice, beans, corn, tomato sauce, fritters, soap, drinks, vegetables, dairy products, packaged meat, and chicken. She also sells tacos, enchiladas, grilled meat, chicken, yucca, etc. 

Dania sells to her neighbors and friends who visit her store daily. She is a working woman with a desire to succeed. Thanks to her efforts she has been able to put all her children through school and has constructed a house and is an example in her commmunity.

Dania is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, corn, tomato sauce, fritters, soap, drinks, vegetables, dairy products, packaged meat and chicken because she needs to invest more in her business to make more of a profit. Easter is coming soon and she would like to be well-stocked and have dry firewood so she can cook her own sweets. She would like to make the most of the Easter period. 

This is her eighth loan from Prisma and she is thankful to Kiva. She makes her repayments. 

Her dream is to improve her quality of life and that of her family. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2015.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, tomato sauce, fritters, soap, drinks, vegetables, dairy products, packaged meat and chicken for her business.

loans.name: Lussalussu (1) Group

texts.en: Alfred is a member of the community bank group LUSSALUSSU (1) in Brazzaville, the Republic of Congo. Helping to lead a subgroup of twelve other micro-entrepreneurs, Alfred has owned and operated his patisserie for the last 15 years. Alfred is now heading into his third loan cycle with HOPE Congo and will use his loan to purchase confectioneries, eggs, butter, and other raw materials necessary for his bakery. At the age of 49 and a father of three children, Alfred makes use of his unique talents and tools, like his special oven, combined with tasty snacks that keep his customers coming back. One day he dreams of being able to expand and modernize his activities in order to improve the quality of his cakes. With those future revenues, he would love to support the higher education of his daughter.

loans.use: to purchase eggs, butter, and other supplies for his patisserie.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and paint, and to tile floors

loans.name: Leudy Manuel

texts.es:
Leudy Manuel es un joven estudiante de medicina, él solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia:
Mi nombre es Leudy y tengo 18 años, actualmente resido en una zona rural de Santiago de los Caballeros, nací y viví por 14 años en un campo llamado Jacagua Adentro al norte de Santiago en la cordillera septentrional de la Republica Dominicana, tengo dos hermanos ambos mayor que yo, no soy casado ni tengo hijos actualmente vivo con mis padres, mi padre trabaja pero mi madre se dedica al hogar.
La carrera que estudio es medicina en la Universidad Tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA), la cual estudio porque es mi anhelo ser médico para ayudar a otros, la cual comencé a cursar hace 4 meses, he tomado materias como Lengua Española básica, Matemática básica, Bilogía, Metodología de la investigación, Orientación y Laboratorio la cual es mi favorita.
Actualmente no contamos con los recursos para seguir costeando mis estudios por lo cual estamos solicitando el préstamo, porque de lo contrario tendría que retirarme de mis estudios, este préstamo nos ayudaría significativamente porque nos ayudaría a seguir adelante con mis estudios.
En mi familia anhelamos ver ese día en que seamos profesionales y lleguemos a ser lo que anhelamos, mis meta son ser médico para ayudar a personas que necesiten y a nivel personal deseo tener una fundación para ayudar a niños pobres y por el momento dar lo mejor de mí y todos mis días de estudio.
Después de terminar mi carrera deseo entrar en un hospital o clínica  y sector salud para  aportar mis conocimientos y así poder ayudar.
texts.en:
Leudy Manuel is a young medicine student and he is requesting a loan to be able to cover his education fees. 

This is his story: 

"My name is Leudy and I am 18 years old. At the moment I am living in a rural area of Santiago de los Caballeros. I was born and lived the first 14 years of my life in the countryside in a place called Jacagua Adentro which is north of Santiago in the northern mountain range of the Dominican Republic. 

I have two brothers who are both older than me and I'm not married nor do I have children. At the moment, I live with my parents. My father works and my mother is a housewife. 

I am studying medicine at the Universidad Tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA), and I have chosen this degree because I long to be a doctor so I can help other people. I started studying 4 months' ago and I have taken subjects like Foundation Spanish Language, Foundation Maths, Research Methodology, Guidance and Laboratory, which is my favourite. 

At present, my family can't afford to continue paying for my studies which is why we are requesting a loan because otherwise, I will have to suspend my studies. This loan will help us a lot because it will help me to continue moving forward with my studies. 

In my family we long for the day in which we become professionals. My goal is to be a doctor so I can help people in need and, on a personal level, so I can start a foundation to help poor children. At the moment, I give my all to my studies every day. 

After finishing my degree I hope to get a job in a hospital or clinic in the healthcare sector so I can put my knowledge to good use."

loans.use: to cover university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator to give to his wife who sells cream, juice, etc.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a business making and selling candy in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30.000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her candy-making business.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like her general store. 

Annabelle dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her candy-making business.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Olivia is 41 years old and has three children who are in school.

Olivia has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Olivia has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Olivia would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items like pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Hülya

texts.en:
Hülya is married with two children.  She decided she needed extra income to raise her children.  She knew how to make sausage and decided on that.  At first she sold to her friends and neighbors.  In time, other people started to order and her business increased.  She heard about Maya’s loans from a close friend and applied for one.  She used her first loan to buy sausage ingredients wholesale.  She made and sold sausages with them, which helped her support her family.  She used her second and will use her third the same way.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Hülya Hanım evli ve iki çocuk annesi.  Çocuklarını büyütmek için ek gelire ihtiyacı olduğuna karar verdi.  Sucuk yapmayı biliyordu ve bunu değerlendirmeye karar verdi.  Önce yakın çevresine satış yaptı.  Zamanla etrafta duyulmaya başladı ve siparişleri arttı.  Maya mikro krediyi bir yakınından duydu ve kredi için başvurdu.  Aldığı kredi ile toptan sucuk malzemesi aldı.  Bunları üretti ve sattı.  Aile bütçesine destek oldu.  İkinci ve üçüncü krediyle de sucuk malzemesi alarak işini ilerletti.

loans.use: to buy sausage ingredients wholesale

loans.name: Florette Edsone

texts.fr:
Florette est une femme débrouillarde, très travailleuse. Elle dirige trois différentes sortes d'activité génératrice de revenu actuellement: d'abord fabrication , livraison et vente de jus naturels et yaourts faits maison, démarré en 2005; ensuite taxi-phone(point d'appel téléphonique) en 2013 et enfin vente de quelques fournitures de bureau récemment.
Elle demande un crédit pour développer ces trois types d'activité. Elle va acheter du lait et des fruits pour la fabrication d' yaourts et des jus naturels; des recharges (crédits) telma, orange et airtel pour le taxi-phone et différentes sortes de fournitures de bureau comme enveloppes, papiers vélin, stylos, carnets, papiers chemises etc...
La raison qui la pousse à effectuer tout ça, c'est pour aider son mari qui est agent de sécurité et dont le salaire est faible, à soutenir sa famille. Elle a 3 enfants qui sont âgés de 18, 12, et 8 ans. Elle veut qu'ils réussissent dans leurs études et leur offrir une meilleure condition de vie.
texts.en:
Florette is a resourceful woman who works hard. She manages three different types of businesses. First, she makes, delivers, and sells natural juices and home-made yogurt, which she started in 2005. Then she opened a taxi-phone (a call point kiosk) business in 2013. More recently, she started selling office supplies.

She is seeking a loan to develop these three businesses. [With her loan], she is going to buy milk and fruit to make her juices and yogurt, phone recharge credits from Telma, Orange, and Airtel for her taxi-phone business, and also different types of office supplies, such as envelopes, vellum paper, pencils, notebooks, paper folders, etc.

The reason she does all this work is to help her husband, who is a security agent and earns low pay, to take care of their family. She has three children who are 8, 12, and 18 years old. 

Florette wants her children to succeed in their studies and offer them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk, fruit, phone recharge credits, and office supplies

loans.name: Nyakatokye Tukore Group

texts.en:
Nyakatookye Tukore group is found in Lugazi, Ibanda town council, Ibanda district. The group is comprised of men and women. They all deal in several businesses and agricultural products.

Jane is a widow with four children. All her children are in school. Jane owns a small grocery shop which she runs with capital of UGX 600,000. She has however grown it gradually. She supports this with her coffee shamba where she earns income to look after her family. She has applied for a loan of UGX 1,000,000 to help her add more stock of groceries to sell in her business. She will use the rest of her money to pay school fees for her children and this affects her income flow. The group appreciates Kiva lenders for partnering with them.

Jane is a very honest and hardworking Woman. She hopes to be the best coffee farmer in the whole village.

loans.use: To buy groceries

loans.name: Hale

texts.en:
Hale is married with one child.  After she got married, her husband made sausages at home and sold them to friends and neighbors for extra income.  At first she did this work to support her husband.  When she learned the job well, she began making them herself.  Her husband had only sold sausages to close friends and neighbors, but she decided to expand.  First she increased sales.  She told everyone about the sausages.  As demand increased, she needed to buy ingredients wholesale but didn’t have enough capital.  To increase her capital and buy sausage ingredients, she got a loan from Maya. She’ll use her third loan to buy meat and spices to make her product and develop her business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Hale Hanım evli ve bir çocuk annesi.  Evlendikten sonra eşi ek iş olarak evde sucuk yapıp yakın çevresine satıyordu.  İlk önce eşine yardım amaçlı bu işe başladı.  İşi tamamen öğrendikten sonra kendi başına sucuk yapmaya başladı.  şi sadece kısıtlı bir çevreye satış yapıyordu ve Hale Hanım bu işi ilerletmeye karar verdi.  Önce satış çevresini geliştirdi.  Sucuk yapıp sattığını bütün çevresine duyurdu.  Talepler artınca toptan sucuk malzemesi alması gerekti fakat sermayesi kısıtlıydı.  Sermayesini artırmak ve toptan sucuk malzemesi almak için Maya mikro kredi kullandı.  Kullandığı üç krediyle de kıyma ve baharat aldı, böylece üretimini ve satışlarını artırdı, işini geliştirdi.

loans.use: to buy sausage ingredients

loans.name: Sezin

texts.en:
Sezin is 61, married and the mother of two children.  After retiring, her pension was insufficient so she began selling underwear from her home.  At first, she only sold to her friends and neighbors, so she started selling at her local market.  She both made more sales and increased her customer base.  With her second loan from Maya, Sezin will buy seasonally appropriate underwear.  She’ll increase both her selection and profits.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff
Sezin Hanım 61 yaşında evli ve iki çocuk annesi.  Emekli olduktan sonra emekli maaşının ev giderlerine yetişmediğini görünce evde çamaşır satmaya başlamış.  Evde sadece belli bir çevreye satış yaptığını düşünen Sezin Hanım hem daha çok satış yapmak hem de müşteri potansiyelini artırmak için semt pazarlarına çıkmaya başlamış ve buradan satışlarına devam ediyor.  Mayadan 2. kredisini kullanan Sezin hanım aldığı krediler ile mevsime uygun toptan çamaşır aldı.  Hem ürününü çeşitlendirdi hem de karını artırdı.

loans.use: to buy seasonally appropriate underwear

loans.name: Rasoanindrina

texts.fr:
51ans, mariée, Rasoanindrina a 6 enfants dont 4 sont scolarisés. Son mari est fonctionnaire. Quant à elle , elle vend différentes sortes d'articles. On dirait qu'elle dirige un magasin général seulement sans local. Elle effectue ce genre de commerce depuis 3 ans. Elle le trouve plus intéressant en chiffre d'affaire et bénéfice journalier par rapport à son ancienne activité. Elle faisait de la peinture à l'aiguille, mais ceci ne lui rapportait plus suffisamment depuis la crise politique de 2009 survenu dans le capital parce que ces clients fondamentaux étaient les touristes. En effet, elle veut investir davantage dans son commerce, elle veut y consacrer toutes ses énergies.
Actuellement, elle loue le terrain sur lequel elle a construit une maison en bois où habite sa famille.Son souhait est de pouvoir acheter ce terrain et d'y construire une maison en dur , en plus le proprio a déjà consenti.
texts.en:
Rasoanindrina is 51 years old, married, and has six children, of whom four go to school. Her husband is a civil servant. As for herself, she works selling various types of goods. One could say that she manages a general store, only without a permanent location. She has done this type of work for three years. 

She finds that the turnover and earnings are better than her previous work. She had been working in needle paining, but that did not earn enough since the political crisis in 2009, because most of her customers were tourists.

Now she wants to invest in her general store, and devote her energy to this business.

At the moment, she rents the land on which she built a wooden house where her family lives. She wishes to be able to buy this land and build a long-lasting house. The current owner has already agreed.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, lipstick, toothbrushes, wipes, spoons, sieves, and hair care goods

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Lufi, who is in his early 30s, is married with two children, one of whom is still at school and the other one is still small.  He has been running a photo studio for eight years now.  He works from 8 am to 8 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Lufi's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy a digital camera and one advanced developing machine and has paid back all his loans successfully. He is really happy with the loan and appreciates the support.  He used the profit to pay school fees, loan repayments, built his own house and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to renovate his office and to buy CDs and DVDs to resell in his office.  He dreams of improving his office and his house.

Lufi will make sure he pays his loan according to the loan schedule.

loans.use: to renovate his office and to buy CDs and DVDs to resell  in his office.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy secondhand clothes to sell

loans.name: Lidia

texts.en: Lidia is 35 years old. She is divorced and she works as a nurse at a hospital located at El Alto. Also, she works as a plumbing assistant every weekend. Lidia is a mother of four children. She needs a loan to build and repair her house because the sewer system is damaged. She hopes you can help her. She is healthy and she works hard but she doesn't receive any help from her ex-husband. In the picture, Lidia is at her house and as you can see, the place is in poor condition.

loans.use: to build and repair her house

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en: Maribel is selling milk to an industrial plant.  She is still living at her parent's house and she needs a loan to buy forage for her milk cows. She wakes up very early in the morning and she works many hours. She has to take care of her parents.  She hopes you can help her again.  She would like to buy more cows in the future.

loans.use: to buy forage for her milk cows.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.en: Marisol is living with her boyfriend and she is still taking care of her son. She is still living in the Akherana community and she has no troubles at her house.  Marisol is still selling milk and this time she needs a loan to buy forage for her cow. Right now, Marisol's boyfriend is unemployed, which is why she needs help again. Marisol would like to buy another cow in the future.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is 48 years old and she has three children, all of whom are living outside Bolivia.  Gregoria is an experienced seamstress. She makes sportswear and she needs a loan to build a couple of rooms that will be very useful for her because she needs a workshop and a better place to sleep 

Gregoria is saving all the money she can because she plans to sell her house and to be with her children in another country. She hopes you can help her. She is responsible and healthy.  In the picture, you see the place where Gregoria will build the rooms.

loans.use: to build a couple of rooms

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura tiene 58 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como perfumes, cremas corporales, talcos, entre otros, se dedica a este negocio desde hace más de 03 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de perfumes, colonias y ropa para incrementar su negocio, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Laura is 58 years old, in a common-law marriage, and lives in her own house in a rural zone of Oyotún district, a community which works in agriculture, business, and raising animals. It is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works selling beauty products such as perfumes, body creams, talcum powder, and more. She has worked in this business for more than 3 years; her business is located in her home. She asks for a loan to purchase perfumes, cologne, and clothing to increase her business, this with the end of increasing her business of these items and meet her customers' needs, which will generate more income and will permit her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, colognes, and clothing to increase her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Carlos Miguel

texts.es: Carlos es un joven emprendedor de 24 años, se dedica a  la cría de cuyes mejorados y a la venta del excremento de cuyes como abono orgánico. Para Carlos es muy importante obtener este crédito con el que podrá comprar cuyes mejorados y su debida alimentación orgánica, para luego seguir con la venta de cuyes orgánicos y también el excremento orgánico para los cultivos de su localidad. En un futuro no muy lejano espera poder ahorrar dinero para poder continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en: Carlos is a young entrepreneur, 24 years old, who works raising improved guinea pigs and selling guinea pig excrement as organic manure. For Carlos, it is very important to get this loan with which he will be able to purchase improved guinea pigs and their necessary organic food, to then continue with his sale of organic guinea pig and also the organic excrement for the crops in his area. In the not-too-distant future, he hopes to save money to be able to continue with his education.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and their organic feed.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy pagnes [bright, colorful fabric]

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of beauty products to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bale of dresses and a bale of pants

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy wax pagnes [bright, colorful fabric]

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Su nombre es Mario, es un hombre que vive en el distrito de Cocachacra, que esta ubicado en el departamento de Arequipa. Se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino, en especial al ganado orgánico, dado que lo comercializa a un mejor precio en su mercado. Mario solicita el micro crédito para poder comprar pequeños cerditos orgánicos dándoles el cuidado necesario para mantener su esencia de carne orgánica. En el futuro espera poder mejorar su pequeño hogar para poder vivir cómodamente y elevar su nivel económico.
texts.en: His name is Mario. He is a man who lives in Cocachacra district, which is located in Arequipa department. He works raising pigs, specifically organic pigs, given that it sells for a better price in his market. Mario asks for the microloan to be able to purchase organic piglets, giving them the care necessary to maintain the organic meat. In the future he hopes to be able to improve his small home to be able to live more comfortably and improve his economic level.

loans.use: to purchase organic pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy used clothing

loans.name: Josefa Jackeline

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señora Josefa, tiene 40 años de edad, está divorciada y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos de 21, 17 y 14 años de edad, todos estudian en universidad, colegio y  escuela.
Doña Josefa es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante con sus hijos, ella tiene un comedor en su casa en el cual todos los días prepara deliciosos almuerzos que son del agrado de sus distinguida clientela, ella varia el menú para que sus clientes siempre tengan variedad en sus platos y estén a gusto con lo que ella prepara, ella también vende ropa por catálogo en su local o si no sale a ofrecer por toda la localidad, lleva más de 10  años con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse la vida y la de sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar platos, vasos y víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Lleva 9 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la agilidad para recibir los  créditos.  Sus sueños son terminar bien su casa  y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Lomas del Porvenir communal bank group meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches which are popular all year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty as well as as many tourist attractions. 

Josefa lives here. She is 40 years old, divorced, and from this relationship they have 3 children, ages 21, 17 and 14, all of whom are students at university, secondary school and primary school. 

Josefa is a woman who likes to work to get ahead with her children. She has a restaurant in her house in which she makes delicious lunches every day which are the pleasure of her distinguished customers. She varies the menu so that her customers always have variety in their dishes and are content with what she prepares. She also sells clothing from a catalog in her restaurant and, if not, she goes out to sell in the whole area. She has had this business for more than 10 years, which allows her to earn her living and that of her children. 

This loan will be used to purchase plates, glasses, and groceries to prepare the dishes. She has been in the communal bank group for 9 years and she likes it for the flexibility of getting the loans. Her dream is to fix up her house well and give her children the best.

loans.use: to purchase plates, glasses, and groceries.

loans.name: Stefany Fernanda

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Stefany, tiene 21 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 18 meses de edad,. Su marido trabaja en una empresa privada. Ella estudia comercio exterior en una universidad local.
Doña Stefany es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar y sus estudios, como no tiene un trabajo fijo ella opto por instalar su propio negocio, ella prepara y vende deliciosos bolos y helados de muchos sabores los mismos que vende en su casa y que son de mucho agrado de sus clientes que todos los días le compran. Este es un negocio que no le quita mucho tiempo y le permite estar al tanto de su hogar, estudiar y ganarse sus propios recursos, llevan más  2 años con este negocio el cual les permite salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar azúcar, chocolate, moras, leche, saborizantes y otros productos para preparar los helados. Lleva 1 año  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos salen adelante. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
The Lomas del Porvenir communal bank group meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches which are popular all year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty as well as as many tourist attractions. 

Stefany lives in this place. She is 21 years old, in a common-law marriage and from this relationship has an 18-month-old son. Her husband works in a private business. She is studying foreign trade at a local university. 

Stefany is a woman who likes to work to help out with the expenses generated in the home and with her studies, since she doesn't have a permanent job, she decided to establish her own business. She makes and sells delicious frozen snacks and ice creams of many flavors which she sells in her house and which are the pleasure of her customers who buy them every day. This is a business which doesn't take much time and lets her keep up with her home, her studies and earn her own resources. She has been doing this business for more than 2 years, which allows her to get ahead. 

This loan is to purchase sugar, chocolate, blackberries, milk, flavorings and other products to make ice cream. She has been in the communal bank group for one year and she likes it because, with the loans, they get ahead. Her dream is to complete her education.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, chocolate, blackberries, milk, flavorings and other products to make ice cream.

loans.name: Muong Phang 25 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Binh is a 26-year-old Thai ethnic lady who has been married and become the mother of two small girls. They live in a Thai ethnic traditional house and rely on cultivation and animal husbandry for a living with plenty of activities, including cultivating rice, growing corn, cassava, and raising buffalo, pigs, chickens, and fish. 

Because of the instability of the earnings from agriculture activities, Mrs. Binh has continued expanding production with the financial support and training of the Anh Chi Em Program. This is the fifth time she has received a loan from the Program and she will use it to buy young fish and food for the fish. She hopes that her investment will bring good income so that she can provide better for her family. 

Mrs. Binh dreams of a better life and a bright future for her children. In the picture, she stands on the first line, at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy young fish and food for the fish

loans.name: Jemimah

texts.en:
Jemimah is 46 years old, married, and blessed with five children. She has been a dairy farmer for the last 10 years and it has been profitable.

She has applied for her first loan from VisionFund Kenya, with which she plans to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer so as to improve her farm production, and she hopes this will enable her to get more income. 

She plans to use the anticipated profit to educate her children. Her future hopes and dreams are to expand her farming business by growing more cash crops.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer so as to improve her production, and she hopes this will enable her to get more income.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 42 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos. Él ha trabajado duro desde muy joven para poder construir su humilde casa que aún no está terminada para en la cual albergar a su familia y trata de brindarles seguridad, por lo que es reconocido en su comunidad como responsable, colaborador y honrado. Desde hace algunos años Julio presta sus servicios de seguridad y con lo poco que gana logra llevar el sustento diario a su hogar trabajando 24 horas y descansa 12 horas. Él manifiesta que desea construir el baño y el techo de su vivienda, Por ello tomo la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertirlo en la compra de: laminas, polines, arena, cemento y ladrillos para construir el baño y cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible evitando que enfermedades puedan darse por no contar con el baño adecuado.
texts.en:
Julio is 42 years old and lives with his wife and his two young children. He has worked hard from a very young age in order to build his humble home, which isn't yet finished, to provide his family with shelter and security. For this reason, he is known in his community as being responsible, cooperative and honourable.

Julio has provided security services for a number of years, and with the small amount he earns, he is able to put food on his family's table. He works 24-hour shifts followed by 12-hour breaks.

Julio says that he wants to build a bathroom and a roof for his home. That is why he has made the decision to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying sheets, poles, sand, cement and bricks to build a bathroom and change the roof of his home as soon as possible, to avoid any diseases caused by not having suitable sanitation facilities.

loans.use: to invest in sheets, poles, sand, cement, and bricks to build a bathroom and change the roof of his home.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is living with his girlfriend at his parents' house. Omar is poor and he can't go to another place. 

Omar makes money by selling milk and making cheese; he learned about this business with his father and mother many years ago.  

Omar needs a loan to buy a milking cow. He works at his parents' farm, but the cow will be his property in the future. 

He hopes you can help him because he wants to be independent as soon as he can.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Silvia Nancy

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Silvia, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 2 hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos  aun viven con ellos y estudia en universidad. Su marido trabaja en la empresa eléctrica de la ciudad.
Doña Silvia es una mujer que le encanta trabajar para no depender de su esposo sino mas bien ayudarle ya sea en el hogar o para los estudios de su hijo, ella se dedica al comercio, vende  sabanas, sobrecamas, cortinas entre otros productos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale tres o cuatro  días  por las tardes y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 5 años que se dedica a este negocio el cual le entretiene y se gana algo por el bien familiar.
Este crédito es para comprar sabanas, sobrecamas, entre otras cosas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 3 años  y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños es tener una cafetería ya que también le encanta cocinar.
texts.en:
The Lomas del Porvenir communal bank group meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches which are popular all year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty as well as as many tourist attractions. 

Silvia lives in this place. Sh is 53 years old, married, and from this relationship they have 2 adult children, one of them still lives with them and is a university student. Her husband works at the electric company in their city.

Silvia is a woman who loves to work so as not to depend on her husband but rather help him either with the home or with their son's education.  She works in sales, selling sheets, bedspreads, curtains, and other products. Her sales method is door-to-door. She goes out three or four days in the evenings and also sells in her home where her most well-known customers come. She leaves her products on credit and collects each week. she has been working in this business for five years, which entertains her and with which she earns something for her family's well-being. 

This loan is to purchase sheets, bedspreads, and other items. She has been in this communal bank group for 3 years and she likes it because the loans are fast. Her dream is to have a cafeteria since she also loves to cook.

loans.use: to purchase sheets, bedspreads, etc.

loans.name: Aracely Viviana

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Aracely,  tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 14 y 7  años de edad, ambos  estudian en colegio y escuela. Ella vive con sus hijos. 
Doña Aracely para salir adelante con sus hijos se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo,  zapatos, carteras, relojes y muchos artículos más,  su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes  cuando necesitan de alguna prenda, ella les a deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le da lo necesario para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, relojes, carteras y zapatos de todo tipo. Ella lleva 3 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así financia su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Lomas del Porvenir communal bank group meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches which are popular all year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty as well as as many tourist attractions. 

Aracely lives in this place. She is 30 years old, and is a single mother of two children, ages 14 and 7, both who are students at the secondary and primary school. She lives with her children. 

Aracely, to get ahead with her children, works in sales. She sells all sorts of clothing, shoes, wallets, watches, and many other items. Her sales method is door-to-door and she also sells in her house, where her customers come when they need an article of clothing. She leaves them on credit and collects every week. She has been working in this business for 4 years, which gives her everything she needs to get her children ahead.

This loan will be used to purchase clothing, watches, wallets and shoes of all sorts. She has been in the communal bank group for 3 years and she likes it because in this way she finances her business. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, watches, wallets and shoes.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señora Ana, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 24, 23 y 14 años de edad, los mayores son profesionales y el menor estudia en colegio. El marido es taxista. 
Doña Ana es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para  ayudarle a su marido con los gastos que generan la educación de sus hijos que para ella es lo más importante, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos como granos, detergentes, carnes, legumbres, entre productos de primera necesidad, allí trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 19h00, también vende artículos de bazar y los fines de semana sale puerta a puerta a vender ropa de todo tipo por la localidad, sale en estos días porque es cuando sus hijos pueden ayudarle con el negocio, de esta forma ella  obtiene muy buenos ingresos extra que le sirven para salir adelante, tiene más de 5 años con el negocio el cual le permite ganar lo suficiente para darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar víveres para surtir su tienda y ropa de todo tipo.  Lleva 10 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir group meets every fortnight in Tarqui neighbourhood in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which many people visit all year round, and for being a city of unparalleled beauty with many tourist attractions.

Señora Ana lives here. She is 38 years old, married, and has three children aged 24, 23 and 14 with her husband. The eldest two are professionals, and the youngest studies at school. Her husband is a taxi driver.

Doña Ana is a woman who enjoys working to help her husband out with the cost of educating her children, which is her number one priority. She has a grocery store in her home in which she sells many different products, including grains,detergents, meat, vegetables, and other basic goods. She works there every day from 6:00 to 19:00. She also sends household products, and at weekends, she goes from door to door selling clothing in the neighbourhood. She does this at weekends because that's when her children can help out with the business. In this way, she makes a decent extra income which she uses to move forwards. She has had her business for over five years, which allows her to earn enough to give her children a good education. 

She will invest this loan in buying groceries to stock her store and different kinds of clothing. She has been a member of the Crédito Lomas Del Porvenir group for ten years, and she likes t because thanks to the loans, she was able to set up her business. Her dream is to offer her children the best of everything.

loans.use: to buy groceries and clothing.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 25 years old and lives in Mangidkid, Plaridel, Philippines. She is married and has two school-aged children. 

She is a farmer who wants start swine production business. Evelyn has requested a loan to buy bags of feed for her swine to start the business. She has been a member of PMPC for two years. 

In the future, she wants to build bigger concrete pig cages.

loans.use: to buy bags of  feed for her swine to start the business.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in 2010 and she appreciates the programs, services, and continuous education of the co-op. She is a member in good standing and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers. 

She has a small piece of farm land near her home. She requests 5,000 PHP to buy farm inputs to start her vegetable garden. 

Carmelita dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life and an adequate income from her business.

loans.use: to start her vegetable garden.

loans.name: Bryan Mauricio

texts.es:
En el corazón de Bryan hay un deseo que se ha estado gestando desde que su gusto por el arte comenzó a florecer y a mostrarle un camino el cual debía seguir.

Es un hombre trabajador, carismático, alegre y con muy buen sentido del humor; calidades que han servido de inspiración para trabajar y realizar las obras graficas y publicitarias con las que actualmente se gana la vida y busca un sustento.

Siendo un hombre sensible y muy consciente de lo difícil que es vivir del arte en Colombia, busca un apoyo económico para comprar materiales como icopor, pinturas, madera y otros materiales que le permitan continuar con su increíble labor y pasión.

Apoya a Bryan en la búsqueda de sus objetivos que son poder ofrecer un producto novedoso, y en el tema personal dese tener una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Bryan's heart harbours a desire which he has nurtured since he became interested in art and which has shown him the path he should follow.

Bryan is hardworking, charismatic and cheerful, and has a very good sense of humour. These qualities have been his inspiration to work and produce the graphic art and advertising which are his means of making a living.

As he is a sensitive man who is aware of how difficult it is to live off art in Colombia, he is seeking financial help to buy materials such as expanded polystyrene, paint, wood and other items he needs to continue his incredible work and passion.

Help Bryan to achieve his goal of offering an innovative product. His personal aim is to buy his own home.

loans.use: to buy materials such as expanded polystyrene, paint, wood and other items he needs to continue his incredible work and passion.

loans.name: Ana Karine

texts.es:
Ana, una mujer humilde y trabajadora, vive en el municipio de Sincelejo desde donde se desempeña en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas como almuerzos y desayunos típicos de la región.

Estos alimentos los vende a unos precios muy favorables teniendo en cuenta la economía de su gente.

Ana desea aumentar su producción y venta de alimentos, desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda y por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio pues podrá preparar una mayor cantidad de alimentos y atenderá mayor cantidad de clientes para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Ana is a modest and industrious woman who lives in the town of Sincelejo. She runs a business preparing common regional breakfast and lunch foods that she sells at prices her customers can afford.  

Ana wants to boost her production and sales and provide herself with a greater financial cushion. She's therefore applying for a loan for the purchase of supplies such as chicken, flour, cheese, and other ingredients that she needs to maintain production. 

This loan will allow Ana to grow her business by preparing more food and serving more customers, increasing the income that she needs to support her family. Ana is grateful the Corporación Interactuar for this opportunity.

loans.use: compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
Felipa is a 55-year-old married woman and her husband is a fisherman. The family lives in Plaridel, Philippines. 

Felipa manages her fishing business and owns fish cages as well. They depend on this business and earn a good income each month doing this type of work.  They are able to support the needs of her big family and educate her children. 

She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase 100 liters of diesel gasoline, paint, and epoxy, and pay for engine repair. 

In the future, Felipa hopes to buy another fishing boat to improve and expand her fishing business.

loans.use: to purchase 100 liters of diesel gasoline, paint, and epoxy, and pay for engine repair.

loans.name: Marianito

texts.en:
Marianito raises pigs and wants to prepare his hogs for proper vaccination and delivery. He will use 5,000 PHP to purchase bags of feed and  vitamins.

Marianito hopes to save money for his children's future.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She is widow and has to support her children's education. She has had a dress making business for 5 years. 

Lucia  needs 3,000.00 PHP to buy additional textiles, buttons, and sewing supplies to continue her business. She is grateful for the help!

loans.use: to buy additional textiles, buttons, and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Junrey

texts.en:
Junrey wants to have a comfortable house to live in. He requests a loan from  PMPC to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to continue building his house. 

Junrey is thankful for the assistance of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks.

loans.name: Ruflan

texts.en:
Ruflan is a 39-year-old single man who lives in Nacional, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Ruflan has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. 

Ruflan earns his living raising hogs and agri-farming. He’s been in the business for 3 years and earns an average monthly income of 2,000 PHP. 

He has requested a loan to purchase 2 piglets for his business.  In the future, Ruflan hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchasing 2 piglets.

loans.name: Hermilanda

texts.en: Hermilanda lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is 73 years old , happily married, and blessed with six children. She has been a seamstress for 10 years and requests a loan to renovate her house.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Lezel

texts.en:
Lezel wants to fulfill her dreams by having a rubber plantation business. She has been in business for 7 years and needs 49,900.00 PHP   to pay for pruning and cleaning labor at the rubber plantation. 

Lezel plans to continue financing her children's education.

loans.use: to pay for pruning and cleaning labor.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married and has four children, and the family lives in Sindangan, Philippines. She is a diligent and persevering mother when it comes to the welfare of her family, and she has always been known to provide the best for it. 

Virginia is earning a living by making snacks that she sells on consignment in shops and cafes. She decided to expand her business after learning that she could obtain financial assistance through PMPC. Consequently, she has requested a 14,900 PHP loan to buy additional ingredients to increase production. 

Her goal is to be able to display her snacks in every shop and place to eat in the area. With the help and support of her husband, Virginia smiles at the thought of having a comfortable and better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for the snacks she makes and sells.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is a hardworking father of five children. He does everything to provide the needs of his family.  

He became a member of Paglaum in May, 2012, and he started his fish-selling business through the financial assistance Paglaum granted to him.

Because of the money entrusted to him, he took good care and paid his obligations diligently.  

Now, he is applying for a new loan worth PHP 14,900 to have working capital and buy additional varieties of fish to sell. Alexander hopes that he can own a motorcycle to use for his business.

loans.use: to buy additional varieties of fish to sell.

location.town: Calamba-Tamban Punta Miray Baliangao Misamis Occid

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 50 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two adult children. 

Lydia has earned her living from a rice-trading business for just a period of one month. She earns approximately PHP 3,500 a month doing this business. 

She has requested a loan to be used to purchase five sacks of rice for her new business. Lydia has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Lydia hopes to expand her rice retailing business and wishes to have her own rice stall.

loans.use: To purchase five sacks of rice.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet operates a motor transport business. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 400 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day. 

For her to continue her business, she availed a loan to pay for motor spare parts and repair. She dreams to own motor units and be able to provide for the family.

loans.use: to pay for motor spare parts and repair.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is a 55-year-old married woman with 2 adult children.   She lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Merlyn earns a living from fish vending business and earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month. 

She has requested a loan to purchase construction materials to repair kitchen and invest in  her fish vending business. Merlyn has been a member of PMPC for 11 years. In the future, Merlyn hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 52 years old, married and lives at Magsaysay, Baliangao, in the Philippines. In order to earn a living she takes in and raises pigs from her neighborhood. When the piglets are sold, their owners share in the profits, which are divided 60/40 or 70/30 depending on their agreement. However, Leonora has a desire to earn more money and has now decided to raise pigs on her own as well. 

Through Pauglam PC, she has already obtained the capital to purchase her own piglets and feed for them. Now, she is requesting a loan of 14,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy additional piglets and feed. She really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, adding to her husband's income. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig pen to easily keep her pigs in more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 44 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has five adult children.
 
Maria has been engaged in managing her own sari-sari store business for 16 years already. She earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this  business activity. The amount is so helpful to meet their needs.  

She has requested a loan to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail.
 
Maria has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Maria hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: To purchase additional groceries and other consumable products.

loans.name: Heldita

texts.en: Heldita is single and lives in Sindangan, the Philippines. For a living, she buys and sells candles in the local community and she has been doing this for 15 years. She hopes to live comfortably, in a decent house. Thus, she has applied for a loan to buy plywood, nails and wood to repair her house. Heldita is a new member of PMPC and in the future, she hopes to save money for emergencies. She wants nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life.

loans.use: to buy plywood, nails and wood for repairing her house

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 63 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural donde la vida es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y comercio, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte urbano desde el distrito de Oyotún a Chiclayo y viceversa, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 3 años. Con el préstamo realizará reparaciones y arreglos a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto el espera brindar un buen servicio a sus cliente y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 63 years old, has a partner, and lives with his family in Oyotún district, in a rural area where life is peaceful and the inhabitants make a living in agriculture and trade. It is located in Chiclayo province in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Santos makes a living providing urban transport services between Oyotún and Chiclayo. He has done this for over three years. He will use the loan to make repairs and maintain his vehicle, which is currently in poor condition.
